cleaned_text: [BECOME A PATIENT](https://pasadenanaturalhealth.com/contact-us/) Conditions We Treat We treat a full range of medical conditions. Learn more about our specialties below. ABOUT PARACELSUS Paracelsus Natural Family Health Center is a unique medical practice that combines the best of modern medicine and natural remedies. Our holistic approach addresses the fundamental causes of health problems. NATUROPATHIC MEDICINE Naturopathic medicine centers on the philosophy that the best medicine promotes the body's natural tendency toward health and self-healing. These doctors provide a range of conventional and alternative treatments. HOW TO BECOME A PATIENT Our mission since opening in 2003 is simple: use natural medicine to have a positive impact on our patients, families and community. We bring this mission of wellness to patients just like you every single day. Are You Interested in becoming a patient? Connect with our office to schedule your free 15 minute consultation and find out if becoming a patient at Paracelsus is right for you.
